name: react
title: ReAct Orchestration Graph
description: Generic ReAct workflow over MCP tools with iterative planning, execution, and reflection.
detailedDescription: LangGraph-powered orchestrator that plans which MCP tool to call, executes it, reflects on the observation, and either continues searching, asks for clarification, or produces a grounded answer. Works with any tool catalog configured at runtime.
author: Flutch Team
